Name: Percentage of cases that eventually reach Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch that occur after First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities per case
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch that are followed by Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch compared to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases with RW-EIC Accept that contain Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities in variants ending with manuscript acceptance
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'RW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch that occur in major revision workflows
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch in relation to First Look-Please submit updates
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' occurs

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities that occur within production-ready manuscripts
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Awaiting Production Checklist'

Name: Number of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities that follow successful First Look updates
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts reaching Awaiting Assignment to Batch out of all submitted manuscripts
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch compared to manuscript withdrawal activities
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript is Withdrawn' occurs

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities in variants with multiple revision cycles
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of days from manuscript submission to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities that occur after RW-EIC Accept decisions
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch in relation to final manuscript export activities
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of accepted manuscripts that successfully reach Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of Awaiting Assignment to Batch in each process variant
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Number of Awaiting Assignment to Batch activities per month in the review process
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
